criticalIssues: Email sending for password reset and verification not fully implemented (services/auth-service)
PACS DIMSE protocol uses stub mode - needs full implementation for external PACS connectivity
State PDMP API integration needed for production pharmacy compliance
Insurance claims processing not implemented - only architecture defined
HL7 v2.x parser is a stub - needs full implementation for lab integrations
Terminology services (SNOMED, LOINC, ICD-10) need external API integration

recommendedFixes.recommendation: Implement SendGrid email sending in auth service for password reset and verification flows
Integrate dcmjs-dimse library for full DICOM C-STORE/C-FIND/C-MOVE support
Integrate with state PDMP APIs (varies by state) for controlled substance monitoring
Implement hl7-standard or hl7apy for lab order and result message parsing
Implement X12 EDI 837/835 support for claims submission and remittance
Connect to NLM UMLS APIs for SNOMED, LOINC, RxNorm lookups
Complete TOTP and SMS challenge flow for multi-factor authentication
